Description:
912m2(Approx.) in ACTIVITY CENTRE ZONE Precinct 2!
Let your imagination run wild with this outstanding development opportunity in the heart of Epping. This enormous allotment represents unique possibilities for all builders and developers to make their mark on this up and coming suburb. Build up, build out, the possibilities are endless.
Property offers a generous lifestyle opportunity as well:
• 3 Bedrooms house on 912m2(approx) rectangular block
• Spacious Kitchen with Meals Area
• Central Bathroom
• Separate Toilet
• Generous Size Family Living
• Possible multi development site (STCA)
If location is what you're after then have a closer look at this gem as it will surely impress. Located close to Epping primary School, Epping Plaza, The Northern Hospital, Epping Train Station, Copper st shopping precinct, Epping Costco(opening soon) Epping memorial park, Saint Peter's primary School, St Monica's Collage, Epping Secondary Collage, just moments from the Hume freeway and easy access to ring road, you do not want to miss out on this chance to purchase this development opportunity.
Enquire now on this once in a life time opportunity and own one of the finest development sites available in the North and be part of Epping's growing success.
NOTE: Link for Due Diligence Checklist:
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Family-friendly design – quiet court locale
Spacious, single level and supremely family-friendly, this inviting home is tucked at the end of a quiet cul de sac and offers a dream opportunity for those who love indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. The flowing floor plan delivers 3 robed bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk-in robe), bright bathroom, front-of-house study/4th bedroom, lounge with beautiful bay window and a vast open plan kitchen/dining/living zone that spills outside to a big covered alfresco and family-friendly garden beyond. With welcome extras such as ducted heating/cooling, double garage, shed and gated access to adjacent reserve land, this home is moments from primary/secondary schools, train station and choice of shopping precincts/cafes.
Features:
Light and spacious family home in a quiet court locale
3 robed bedrooms (master with WIR/ensuite), study/4th bedroom
Lounge with bay window, vast open kitchen/dining/living zone
Solid timber kitchen – s/steel appliances, ducted heating/cooling
Huge covered alfresco, level lawn, shed, double garage and more

Description:
Great Neighbourhood! Convenient Living!
Epping – Attention First home buyers, Investors and Downsizers. Here is an opportunity to buy an awesome family home in a great neighbourhood.
Know your neighbourhood….
- Epping Shopping centre – 1.4 kms ( approx.)
- Epping Primary School – 1.3 kms (approx.)
- Epping Secondary College – 2.4 kms ( approx.)
- Al Siraat College – 1 kms ( approx. )
Other features of this home include;
- Three spacious bedrooms, master bedroom w/ensuite
- Modern home with open plan living.
- Spacious court yard and outdoor entertaining are
- Stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances.
- Ducted heating and airconditioning.
- Close to schools, shops, transport and freeway.
Please Call Manny Singh or Thomas Aloysius.

Description:
READY TO RELAX
This spacious townhome has it all. Location; in central Epping moments to Pacific Epping, Costco, train, Northern Hospital, local schools, shops plus easy access to Cooper street & the Western Ring Road. Property; 3 spacious bedrooms main with ensuite, all with robes, 2 living areas, remote garage, full size laundry, open kitchen with servery and a low maintenance backyard. Finished; with new carpet, new blinds, freshly painted, heating/cooling, s/s appliances and plenty more. Put this one at the top of your list.

Description:
Land of Opportunity
Located just off Lyndarum drive, is a magnificent opportunity to secure a prime 316sqm approx parcel of land located in the Aurora. This exclusive development invites a refreshing suburban lifestyle, inspired by environmental sustainability, only 24km from Melbourne CBD, surrounded by every convenience including excellent public and private schools, buses, freeway, Pacific Epping, Aurora Village, Epping North Shopping Centre and Westfield Plenty Valley and more.
Build your dream home or investment property STCA, in a tranquil leafy setting whilst being only moments away from everything you need.

Description:
The Grandest Of Them All
ID must be provided for inspection!
One of the most iconic homes of the prestigious and highly sought-after Lyndarum Estate, this architectural master creation has left no stone unturned to produce one of the most luxurious homes that needs to be seen to be appreciated. This home of 4 bedrooms and 2-bathrooms reveals seriously slick interiors and superior design credentials to an exceptional detail. Perfectly planned around a lavish pool and outdoor alfresco area overlooked through seamless glass from the comfort of your living room, this masterpiece truly represents the ultimate family lifestyle and entertaining.
Upon entry you will be amazed by the modern design throughout, measuring approximately 53sq including basement/man-cave below the double garage. Revel in the luxury and wonderful proportions of this intelligent layout, a grand entrance, sophisticated open plan living and dining area featuring a designer kitchen that takes preparing and catering for a large family and guests to an impressive new level with seductive Calcutta marble surfaces, ILVE appliances and a desirable butler pantry with Caesarstone benchtops. The main bathroom and 4th bedroom are also conveniently located downstairs for that stayover guest or visiting family.
Residing on the second floor, the elegant master bedroom is accompanied by a generously custom fitted walk-in-robe, Caesarstone stone twin-vanity and beautiful standalone bath also feature in the ensuite.
A world of convenience at your doorstep with a range of family-focused lifestyle attractions including Epping Views Primary School, Woolworths, Lyndarum local shops, Epping Train Station, Bus stops, parklands and more. What else would you need to secure this opportunity!
Features include ducted heating, cooling, alarm system, downlights and double car remote controlled garage.
A Truly extraordinary home that needs to be inspected to be appreciated. Avoid disappointment and inspect today!

Description:
Custom Design Luxury Living On Grand Scale
Unrivalled elegance and grandeur built to the highest standards, this timeless masterpiece showcases finest workmanship in quality inclusions and craftsmanship, boasting an endless list of luxury features with epic space and unbridled opulence. Its sprawling layout of 62 sq. brilliantly spread out over two levels is perfect for someone looking for ultimate warm welcoming home offering an abundance natural light, space on grand scale. Space and natural light is maximized by high 3 meter ceilings, curved windows and is defined by its impressive proportions and elegant style. A wide entrance leads to formal lounge with gas fire place to keep you warm in colder months, study/office, luxurious king size master bed with full ensuite and WIR on ground floor, powder room and world class gourmet kitchen complete with top of the range SS appliances, extra-large island benchtop with waterfall ends, bi-fold windows, butler pantry with full second kitchen overlooking meals and family living zones leading to amazing sundrenched alfresco with dedicated barbeque area with full kitchen and low maintenance backyard. Walk up the stairs and be greeted with opulence and space of large family retreat leading to large balcony with uninterrupted views, second king size master bedroom with walk in robes, full ensuite with spa only to rival five star luxury suite, three other spacious king size bedrooms with BIR well serviced by spacious central bathroom. Other features include double garage, hard wood timber flooring, luxurious carpets,
high ceilings on both levels, built in vacuuming system, zoned refrigerated cooling & heating, storage shed, security alarm system, video intercom on both levels, terracotta roof tiles etc. add to the profile of an outstanding family home within close proximity to local schools, child care, well maintained parklands, health & recreational facilities, newly built Aurora shopping village, Lyndarum north shopping precinct, Epping plaza, northern hospital, soon to be opened COSTCO, Epping train station and very easy access to ring road freeway.
If you are looking for an exclusive residence in ever popular Epping, then your
search ends here. Inspection is must. Call today.
Photo I.D. required

Description:
Nest or Invest In Lyndarum Estate
This quality built family home is perfect for those looking for space and comfort in a peaceful quite location in front of vast parklands. Sitting on approximately 404 sqm of premium land, It will win your heart the moment you step inside offering formal lounge, three spacious bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in robes and full ensuite, other bedrooms with BIR, spacious central bathroom, large laundry, storage room, upmarket kitchen with stone benchtops with large pantry and 900mm SS appliances overlooking family and dinning zone leading to a lovely decked entertainment outdoor and a low maintenance backyard to entertain friends and family for years to come. Other features include ducted heating, remote operated double garage etc. all in close proximity to newly built Coles shopping precinct, leisure centre, Epping plaza, Epping train station, Northern hospital, soon to be opened COSTCO, buses, local schools, park lands, medical and health facilities and easy access to freeway. Suitable for first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike this home is sure to impress all.
Inspection a must!

Description:
Spacious, Comfortable & Convenient
A lifestyle package providing the ideal home for fabulous family living, this attractive brick residence in a whisper quiet court enjoys perfect presentation and a perfect position, moments from the secondary school and the bus to the Plaza and station, and an easy stroll to Greenbrook Village. Four bedrooms including main with ensuite, a choice of formal and casual living zones, and a generous covered alfresco area set in an equally expansive landscaped rear garden delivers a sought-after combination of space, comfort and convenience!
-Hard-wearing timber floors
-Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ducted vacuum
-Shed
-Double garage
-Solid timber kitchen, quality appliances
-Perfectly presented and positioned

Description:
Easy Living, No Maintenance Environment
Set Negotiation: Monday 15th October at 6:00pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Nestled in this sought-after enclave just moments from Hayston Park, Lyndarum Village and the bus to the station and Plaza, this single level home delivers a superb starter, desirable downsizer or long term set and forget investment. Opening to the single bedroom, pristine bathroom and private rear garden, a generous climate controlled open plan living meals zone anchored by a stainless-steel equipped kitchen forms the hub of the home. Delivering easy living in a virtually no maintenance environment, this a perfect affordable start to real estate success!
-Car-parking allocated/on title
-Split system climate control
-Spacious carpeted living zone
-Bedroom with built in robe
-Kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances
-Concealed laundry

Description:
Fabulous Living And A Four Car Garage
An inviting offering to nesters and investors, this three bedroom, two bathroom home enjoys a peaceful court location just moments from parks, schools, shops, bus and within easy reach of Westfield and South Morang stations, it ticks all the boxes! Complementing the formal living, dining, spacious meals area and the pristine kitchen, is a fabulous sun room stretching the width of the house, it has walls of bi-folds which can be opened for the ultimate alfresco experience, and its generous four car garage will impress both tradie and handyman alike!
-Four car garage
-Ducted heating
-Air conditioner
-New carpet
-Kitchen with quality appliances
-Large formal living dining
-Supersized sunroom/alfresco
-North facing rear yard

Description:
Close, Cosy & Convenient!
This delightful home has a lot to offer. Situated in a Epping's best sort out after pocket. Either a home owner's dream or an ideal investment. Comprising of two generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR and EN-SUITE plus a second bathroom. A large formal lounge room, an open plan kitchen with generous dining and living areas and a large al fresco for those wanting more space. A quality home throughout with high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and single car garage with internal access. Minutes away from Recreation Reserve, City Soccer Club, Football Club, close to Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, other local shops, schools, transport , gyms and much more! Throw your car keys away and don't miss out on this one!

Description:
Family Living in Prime Location!
This great sized home, situated in a location second to none, walking distance to Pindari Avenue & McDonalds Road Shops, close proximity to Westfield Plenty Valley & Pacific Epping, Primary & Secondary Schools, and transport is basically at your doorstep! Sitting on 533sqm approx of prime real estate comprising of:
- 3 Bedrooms with built in robes (master with ensuite)
- 2 bathrooms (2 toilets, 2 showers and bathtub)
- Dishwasher, 900mm s/steel gas cook top and s/steel oven
- Large laundry with extra storage space
- Evaporative Cooling
- Ducted Heating
- Double car garage with roller door on both end (up to 3 cars space on driveweay)
- Alarm system
- Large undercover patio great for entertaining
You will not want to miss out on this opportunity, inspect today!

Titled land in Lyndarum Estate
An exciting opportunity to buy a titled block of premium land in a coveted location full of merits. This premium parcel of vacant land will offer you the opportunity to build your home the way you want it. Nestled among the prestigious family homes in a vibrant community environment, you will enjoy the easy connectivity to freeway, local primary & secondary schools, Aurora shopping village, Epping north shopping precinct, Epping plaza, Epping train station, newly built COSTCO, well maintained parklands, child care, buses, health and leisure centres etc. at your doorsteps. Description:
Massive Warehouse and Office Space!
On offer is a warehouse/office space with options to suit any business. Ready to move straight in and get up and running.
Features include:
- Warehouse and Mezzanine
- High clearance roller doors
- 8 allocated parking spaces
- Multiple large offices and meeting rooms
- Split system heating and cooling throughout
- Break rooms and 2 kitchenettes
- Plenty of storage and large open floor space
- Land size of 465 sqm approx.
Rental estimate - $60,000 PA +GST + Outgoings
*Desks, chairs, partitions and other furniture pictured is available if desired. Prices will be by negotiation.
This near-new and clean office and warehouse space is fit to suit any business, in a busy Epping location just off Cooper St.

Description:
Prime Position. Perfect Potential
This neat and tidy single level home presents a prime opportunity to settle into this highly sought after pocket of Epping. A great prospect for a variety of buyers, it offers three bedrooms, spacious lounge room, formal dining and large family meals overlooked by a modern kitchen featuring plenty of storage and preparation space. The gated and fenced rear yard introduces a covered alfresco area, complementing it with a pool ready for summer fun. A short walk to Findon Creek Park, the station is within an easy stroll and the Plaza within a short drive or bus ride. It presents the opportunity to move in straight away and enjoy as is, before undertaking a value adding contemporary update!
~ Gated parking with additional off-street parking
~ Shed
~ Alfresco area with cafe blinds
~ Gas heating
~ Ducted cooling
~ Short walk to primary, secondary and pre schools
~ Scope to add value over time
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Contemporary Living At It's Best!
Set in the sought after Lyndarum Estate and within close proximity to Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Lyndarum Shopping Complex, Child Care Centres, Schools and transport. Comprising of four generous sized bedrooms with built in robes (master bedroom with quality en-suite walk in robe, quality open-plan kitchen with high-end stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and storage space with adjoining meals area, large study/living room, generous family area, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, security alarm system, ample storage, down lights throughout, quality blinds, low maintenance front and backyard and a double remote control garage with internal and rear access. An opportunity not to be missed!
